name: Vivek Ramaswamy
title: Entrepreneur and Political Commentator
summary: Vivek Ramaswamy speaks with a rapid pace and energetic delivery, using precise vocabulary and complex sentence structures to convey his ideas about policy and business.
bio: Vivek Ramaswamy is an American entrepreneur, author, and political commentator. He founded Roivant Sciences, a pharmaceutical company, and has written about topics including stakeholder capitalism and political ideology in America.

samples.title: American Identity
samples.fullText: We need to revive a culture of American excellence and meritocracy. The question isn't what race you are, but whether you embrace our founding ideals of liberty, constitutional self-governance, and open debate.
